price: They will pass around to one another a glass [of pure wine] which does not lead to idle talk or sin.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
